name: SocialEngagement

methods.name: deleteSocialPost
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.DeleteSocialPostIntent deleteSocialPost(String socialPostId, String socialAccountId)
methods.description: Delete a social post from its social network.

methods.name: followSocialPersona
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.FollowSocialPersonaIntent followSocialPersona(String socialPersonaId, String socialAccountId)
methods.description: Follow a social persona in its social network.

methods.name: followSocialPostPersona
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.FollowSocialPersonaIntent followSocialPostPersona(String socialPostId, String socialAccountId)
methods.description: Follow a social persona on a social post in its social network.

methods.name: getIntents
methods.description: Get available intents for a social post.

methods.name: getManagedSocialAccount
methods.description: Get a managed social account that is in the org and assigned to the user.

methods.name: getManagedSocialAccounts
methods.description: Gets a list of managed social accounts that are in the org and assigned to the user.

methods.name: getManagedSocialAccounts
methods.description: Get a list of managed social accounts that are in the org and assigned to the user.

methods.name: getRelationship
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.SocialAccountRelationship getRelationship(String id, String socialPersonaId)
methods.description: Get the follow relationship between a managed social account and a social persona.

methods.name: hideSocialPost
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.HideSocialPostIntent hideSocialPost(String socialPostId, String socialAccountId)
methods.description: Hide a social post in its social network.

methods.name: likeSocialPost
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.LikeSocialPostIntent likeSocialPost(String socialPostId, String socialAccountId)
methods.description: Like a social post in its social network.

methods.name: massApprove
methods.description: Approve or reject the publishing of a large number of social posts.

methods.name: recallApproval
methods.description: Recall an approval request to publish a social post.

methods.name: unfollowSocialPersona
methods.signature: public static Void unfollowSocialPersona(String socialPersonaId, String socialAccountId)
methods.description: Stop following a social persona in its social network.

methods.name: unfollowSocialPostPersona
methods.signature: public static Void unfollowSocialPostPersona(String socialPostId, String socialAccountId)
methods.description: Stop following a social persona of a social post in its social network.

methods.name: unhideSocialPost
methods.signature: public static Void unhideSocialPost(String socialPostId, String socialAccountId)
methods.description: Unhide a social post in its social network.

methods.name: unlikeSocialPost
methods.signature: public static Void unlikeSocialPost(String socialPostId, String socialAccountId)
methods.description: Unlike a social post in its social network.

description: Manage information about social accounts or fan pages for social networks.
